meta_description: Tacoma Art Museum serves the diverse communities of the Northwest through its collection, exhibitions, and learning programs.
hours_text:
# Hours and Admission

## Hours

Monday **CLOSED**  
Tuesday **CLOSED**  
Wednesday **10 am – 5 pm**  
Thursday **10 am – 8 pm** , ([free admission 5 pm – 8 pm](https://www.tacomaartmuseum.org/events-info/neighborhood-nights/))  
Friday **10 am – 5 pm**  
Saturday **10 am – 5 pm**  
Sunday **10 am – 5 pm**

* * *

# Admission

Adults:**$18**  
Seniors (65 +):**$15**  
Military (active duty or retired with ID): **$15**  
Youth (6-18): **$10**  
Every Thursday (5 pm – 8 pm): **FREE**  
Disability Caregivers: **FREE**

#### [GET TICKETS>>](https://tacomaartmuseum.my.salesforce-sites.com/ticket/#/events/a0SfI000000IT6nUAG)

##### 

* * *

#### Members

#### [FREE](http://www.tacomaartmuseum.org/support/membership/)

* * *

## Discount Admission Programs

Each year, over 20,000 people visit Tacoma Art Museum and participate in programs for free. [Check out the many programs we offer for free and discounted admission>>](https://www.tacomaartmuseum.org/visit/hours-admission/discount-admissions-programs/)

_Please contact[Membership@TacomaArtMuseum.org ](mailto:Membership@TacomaArtMuseum.org)with any questions._

* * *

## Holiday Hours

#### **Open**

  * Easter Day

#### **Closed**

  * President’s Day
  * Memorial Day
  * Juneteenth
  * Independence Day
  * Labor Day
  * Thanksgiving Day
  * Christmas Day
  * New Years Day

accessibility_text:
# Accessibility

Tacoma Art Museum provides opportunities for people with disabilities to connect to the world of art through a variety of accessible features. If you require accommodations, please contact us before your visit, as we may require advance notice to provide certain accommodations.

The Tacoma Art Museum strives to provide an enriching experience for all visitors. The information below provides a general overview of accessibility options available at the Museum. We encourage you to contact us for specific questions or needs. Please email us at [Info@TacomaArtMuseum.org](mailto:Info@TacomaArtMuseum.org) or call 253-272-4258 for further details regarding accessibility and accommodations.

## Accessible Parking Spaces

Accessible parking spaces for vehicles displaying the appropriate disability permits are located closest to the elevator in the parking lot behind Tacoma Art Museum. These designated spots are available on a first-come, first-served basis in the Hood Street parking area. The parking lot is ADA-accessible; its elevator operates between the parking lot level and the main Museum lobby, and is accessible via the parking elevator lobby.

## Pacific Avenue Entrance

An automated barrier-free entrance leading to the lobby is located along Pacific Avenue. A vehicle drop-off area is located adjacent to the Museum’s main Pacific Avenue entrance.

## Wheelchairs

Courtesy wheelchairs are available free of charge upon request at the Front Desk on a first-come, fi...
